title: Rename music button label to “For You”

requirements.summary: Rename the user-facing music button label text to exactly “For You” anywhere it is displayed in the music player UI.
acceptanceCriteria: The music button label displays exactly “For You” (matching capitalization and spacing).
No other UI text is unintentionally changed.
The music player continues to function normally (play/pause, volume, mute, and audio-source behavior remain unchanged).

file_operations.description: Update the collapsed/floating music button label text so it displays exactly “For You” wherever the music button text is shown, without altering any playback, mute, volume, or audio-source logic.
